```{r setupFisheryCharacteristics, include=FALSE}
    ##input model list
    Models<-params$Models;
    doc_type<-params$doc_type;
    plot1stObs<-params$plot1stObs;
    
    ##set knitr options for subsequent chunks
    knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, concordance=TRUE, fig.width=6.5, fig.height=7.0, dpi=300)
    
    ##set caption numbering
    if (!exists("fig")){
      fig<-1;#figures
      tbl<-0;#tables
    }
    
    cases<-names(Models);
    nCases<-length(cases);
```

#Fisheries

##Fishery catchability

```{r plotFisheryCatchability,results='asis',fig.height=6.5,fig.width=6.5,out.width="6.5in",fig.cap=captions,eval.after="fig.cap",fig.pos="H"}
  plts<-rCompTCMs::compareResults.Fisheries.Catchability(Models,dodge=0,showPlot=FALSE,verbose=FALSE)
  captions<-wtsUtilities::getCaptionsFromGGPlotList(plts);
  for (plt in plts) {print(plt); cat("\n\n"); fig<-fig+1;}
  rm(plt,plts);
```

##Total selectivity functions

```{r plotFisherySelFcns,results='asis',fig.height=6.5,fig.width=6.5,out.width="6.5in",fig.cap=captions,eval.after="fig.cap",fig.pos="H"}
  plts<-rCompTCMs::compareResults.Fisheries.SelFcns(Models,cast="y+x",facet_grid="y~x",mxy=5,years=1986:2015,dodge=0,
                                                    showPlot=FALSE,verbose=FALSE);
  captions<-vector(mode="character",length=0);
  for (fplts in plts) {
    captions<-c(captions,wtsUtilities::getCaptionsFromGGPlotList(fplts));
    for (plt in fplts) {
      print(plt); cat("\n\n"); fig<-fig+1;
    }
  }
  rm(plt,fplts,plts);
```

##Retention functions

```{r plotFisheryRetFcns,results='asis',fig.height=6.5,fig.width=6.5,out.width="6.5in",fig.cap=captions,eval.after="fig.cap",fig.pos="H"}
  plts<-rCompTCMs::compareResults.Fisheries.RetFcns(Models,cast="y+x",facet_grid="y~x",mxy=5,years=1986:2015,dodge=0,
                                                    showPlot=FALSE,verbose=FALSE);
  captions<-vector(mode="character",length=0);
  for (fplts in plts) {
    captions<-c(captions,wtsUtilities::getCaptionsFromGGPlotList(fplts));
    for (plt in fplts) {
      print(plt); cat("\n\n"); fig<-fig+1;
    }
  }
  rm(plt,fplts,plts);
```
